sub_title: eCommerce Manager (Value Added Services) at Miele X
summary:
Proactive, detailed-oriented and committed young professional, with over 6 years of experience in Digital Marketing and over 10 total years of experience within Marketing.

Graduate from Luiss Guido Carli (one of the premiere marketing & business schools in Italy) in 2013 in an English-only Master's Degree course of International Business, I started working, in the same year, for Methorios Capital, a consulting company in Rome, gaining experience in equity and debt capital markets.

In October 2014 - following my goal to have a career in a multinational corporation - I got hired by the British tobacco company Imperial Tobacco, as a part of a  graduate program. I started my experience in the Brand Marketing department and in 2016, after an internal re-organizational model, I moved to Trade Marketing for the new South Eastern European Cluster of Imperial Tobacco, taking care of the Italian market as a Planning Coordinator.

With the launch of the e-cigs brand blu in Italy, I moved to digital marketing, which is the field I'm currently pursuing a career. I coordinated for 2 years the overall planning and execution of digital marketing activities for blu in Italy, focused on driving brand awareness, social Share of Voice and conversion to sales, and strictly linked to the overall brand marketing plan and developments.

In January 2020 I moved to the Amsterdam HQs of Fontem Ventures, the subsidiary of Imperial Tobacco which owns the e-vapour brand blu and which serves as the center of excellence for digital marketing to all global markets. With the qualification of Digital Project Manager, I acted as a bridge between local markets and the global HQ, coordinating roll-outs of new digital products and gathering feature requests from markets. I collaborated on a daily basis with designers, developers, testers, SEO agency, internal stakeholders and local market stakeholders.

In June 2021 I decided to change industry and moved to the Web & Display team of Pandora A/S, working as a Digital Project Specialist in the company HQs in Copenhagen, and being responsible for defining, handling and executing all digital projects, marketing campaigns and content management across markets.

In October 2022 I returned to Amsterdam to take on the eCommerce Manager role at Miele X (subsidiary of the German household appliances manufacturer). I am now responsible for different projects on the website, aimed at generating additional revenue streams and improving brand consideration.

certifications.name: ICAgile Certified Professional - Agile Team Facilitation

profile_positions.description:
As part of the eCommerce Sales Department, this role drives business development of eCommerce initiatives, tools and features on miele.com (e.g. live-shopping, rating & reviews, product advisor, personalization), aimed at generating additional revenue streams.

Lead the projects end-to-end: identifying customer needs, creating the business case, selecting the new tools, determining the KPIs, running a test pilot, rolling-out the tool and preparing the business development plan for ongoing A/B testing

Create the team's long-term roadmap with current tools, services, new D2C initiatives, opportunities, and optimization programs

Consant collaboration with external partners, Procurement, IT, Onsite Performance, Product Teams and local countries
profile_positions.title: Ecommerce Manager (Value Added Services)

profile_positions.description:
Part of the Web & Display team in Global Marketing and responsible for defining, handling and executing all digital projects, marketing campaigns and content management across markets

Merge brand perspectives with commercial targets, to propel digital business and to master the experience on pandora.net with engaging digital initiatives and drive digital web projects, focusing on creating shopping experiences

Main projects: revamp of the website's Discover section; launch and maintenance of Bracelet Builder (13% CR YTD vs 2% website average) , Gift Finder (3% CR YTD), Virtual Try-On (31k DKK revenues YTD + 69% vs non-users); launch of a live-shopping pilot in Italy (4% CR, 12k sessions, 11k EUR revenues in 48hrs)
profile_positions.title: Digital Project Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Fontem Ventures is an Amsterdam-based subsidiary of Imperial Tobacco, leader in vaping technology and owner of the e-vapour brand blu®

Main interface between key markets (IT, FR, ES, GR, RU, CZ, ME) and the Global Digital teams, translating market requests in the field of eCommerce & Lifecycle into requirements which feed the backlogs of the HQ Digital Product teams (Agile structure). Constant collaboration with designers, developers, testers, internal and external stakeholders.

Contribution to the roll-out and configuration of the Digital Product teams’ output and new solutions in the local markets. Responsible for ensuring local operational excellence by following the local performance, training the markets and sharing local best practices

Main achievements: 2020 tot. blu® online revenues +33% vs 2019 (GA); 2020 e-CRM revenues: +23% vs 2019
profile_positions.title: Digital Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Coordination for the overall planning and execution of digital marketing activities for blu® in Italy, focused on driving brand awareness, social Share of Voice and conversion to sales, and strictly linked to the overall brand marketing plan and developments

eCommerce coordination: catalogue management (SKU set-up, stock control) & pricing strategy (promotion plan aimed at generating trial & loyalty), registration tactics, website CMS content management aligned with brand campaign, Amazon Marketplace coordination.
2019 GA sessions: +280% vs 2018; 2019 GA revenues : +2800% vs 2018

eCRM coordination: planning & sending of consumer communications based on relevant segmented audiences and online behaviors (SalesForce Marketing Cloud).

Craft other digital marketing activities aimed at generating traffic and conversions to blu® website (social, media, influencers marketing, programmatic & reservation display ADV, content and linkbuilding SEO)
profile_positions.title: E-commerce, E-CRM & SEO Coordinator

profile_positions.description: Responsible for driving the trade operational planning elements required to deliver commercial results for Italy in the newly-built South Eastern Europe Cluster (focus on visibility and sales programs and on retailers’ advocacy tactics). Development of the Sales Cycles Calendar and the Trade Coverage Plan
profile_positions.title: Trade Planning Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Hired through the Imperial Tobacco Graduate Program

Support in the development of key asset brands (Golden Virginia, Drum, JPS, Rizla) through sales and brand funnels analysis, proposing and executing marketing activities in line with global activation brand toolkits

Management of creative agencies with clear briefs, outlining strategy, scope of assignments and project timelines

Special project - Operational implementation of EUTPD (European Tobacco Product Directive): stock-building, pre-production plans, de-listing, trade solutions, field-force communications, consumer communications, new pack artworks review
profile_positions.title: Brand Executive

profile_positions.description:
Italian listed company active in financial advising, IPOs and merchant banking

Market analysis, designing of the management presentation and business planning on behalf of the client company (involvement in deals with companies from the energy business, insurance market, telecommunications, fashion business, bio-tech and Aerospace segment)
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst
